Text: As usual, my upload capacity isn't the best - 24/3 - so please show some patience, and make sure to help out seeding once you're done downloading. I appreciate it.

@reactor903: Please do. It's an amazing band, right up my alley. Like many others, I discovered them via the game Mass Effect (M4 (Part II), and once I started checking their other songs out, I was instantly smitten. :)
loved the music sorry my other account got banned..

Oh, wow. I'm speechless. Do you realize how long I've been looking for these? Thank you so much. Faunts is based in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. And, I live there, so, you can see, I love em. Indie is awesome. Anyways, I cannot believe that this was uploaded only 4 minutes after I went to sleep after 3 hours of looking for it. THANK YOU!!!! And, awesome quality Kindo. 320kbps is near perfect in my books.

@m0t0ko: Hehe. Well, I've found torrents with their music (except for the remix one), but they're all in quite low quality - M4 is even in 128 CBR! Like you, I was searching like mad for anyplace that had higher quality releases. Eventually I gave up and bought them at that store (they offer MP3-version at 320 - they had all the albums), and figured I might as well create my own torrent. Canada has bred some great musicians over the years, and this might just be their finest yet! I'm situated, myself.
(Somehow I missed something in my last comment): I'm situated in Sweden, myself.
Ive got high hopes for this band. I loved M4 partII at the end of Mass Effect so I cant wait to see how there other music compares.
Thanks for the torrent!!! Wasn't sure I'd be able to find one!!!!
Great artist, so glad to see this.
